text: geoperu package provides convenient interface access official spatial datasets Peru directly R. data collected National Institute Statistics Informatics (INEI) Peru.

title: Download Spatial Datasets of Peru
text: can install development version geoperu follows: access spatial information districts province Peru, can use get_geo_peru() function. visualize retrieved geospatial information get_geo_peru() function geoperu package, can use various tools R. common option use ggplot2 library along sf object visualization functionality. ’s basic example visualize data:  geoperu also provides access spatial information natural protected areas Peru. areas, managed declared National Service Natural Protected Areas (SERNAP), encompass diverse range ecosystems. get_anp_peru() function allows users download spatial data representing protected areas directly R environment.  can customize plot adding additional layers, adjusting styles, adding labels according specific needs.

title: Download spatial data of Peru — get_geo_peru
text: geography character vector name geographical region. exception "" request Peru data. level character: "" national level data, "dep" department level data, "prov" provincial level data. simplified logical TRUE FALSE, select data districts polygon simplified higher level. showProgress Logical TRUE FALSE display progress bar download.
